Articles.Content:
So im having difficulty with a space shipbuild of mine I am trying to build a new comm sat for to use with Remote Tech to allow for my mapping satelites to orbit the mun and  would like to setup some synchronous orbit sats to do this. So what i have here is a version 2 of my comm sats version ones worked fine but they were half the size they used all .625 parts and now im working with 1.25 m parts here i have some more batteries a bigger antenna and a different probe core. So really the only thing thats the same is the base of the rocket. the part that lifts the probe into orbit.

The problem is now whenever i try to launch this it does this nice tumble and flies nicely out of control. I admit i am not  the best pilot but have a see for yourself.

Solved my problem read on another thread to check the weight of the top stage of my rocket incase there was a problem there. 

Solving the issue just meant adding a beefier base and upgrading the boosters.
Congrats, and welcome to the forum.

Congrats!

I always find it easier to build a two stage rocket to add upper weight. 

Good luck on your satellite mission.
